explanation.num_tested_probands: The text mentions three separate cases of probands with compound heterozygous mutations in WARS2, indicating three probands were tested.
explanation.num_positive_het_probands: No information about simple heterozygous probands was found; all cases described were compound heterozygous.
explanation.positive_phenotypes: Phenotypes were explicitly mentioned throughout the text, including infantile-onset Parkinsonism and various motor symptoms. Inferred phenotypes related to WARS2 deficiency and mitochondrial dysfunction were also noted.
explanation.num_compound_or_double_hets: Each proband described was compound heterozygous, with explicit mentions of compound heterozygous mutations in WARS2 for each case.
